other communities in Northumberland County

These are pictures from the area around Castleton, Ontario. Cramahe Baptist Church is now closed but many local McKagues had very strong ties to it. It is just outside the village of Castleton. Please let us know if you can add any more local photos to our archive. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
